point1: Learn the basics of budgeting, saving, investing, and managing personal finances effectively.
Understand the fundamental principles of accounting and financial statements.
Explore the world of stocks, bonds, and investment strategies.
Gain skills in building financial models to analyze businesses and investments.
Explore the concepts of risk assessment and how insurance works.
Get insights into the banking industry, its functions, and financial products.
Learn about managing wealth, estate planning, and inheritance.
Understand how technology is reshaping the financial industry, including blockchain and cryptocurrency.
Understand the legal and regulatory aspects of the finance industry.
Dive into financial statement analysis and reporting for businesses.
Learn how to manage credit, understand credit reports, and improve credit scores.
Specifically tailored to the financial needs and goals of young adults.
Explore online brokerage platforms, stock trading, and investment strategies for beginners.
Discover how to use personal finance apps for budgeting, expense tracking, and financial planning.
Learn about digital wallets, peer-to-peer payments, and cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin.
